{{Infobox Berry |name = Cornn |image = [[File:Cornn.png]] |caption = Its dryness is quite strong. As a result, its true deliciousness can't be appreciated by just eating one or two. |growtime = 2h 30m 0s |harvest = 26 berries |replant = 10% |points = 700 |flavor =
*0 spicy *20 dry *10 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Cornn''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Leppa]], at least 1 [[Bluk]] and at least 1 [[Wiki]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 18 mins 20 secs || 1 hour 6 mins 40 secs || 2 hours 13 mins 20 secs || 2 hours 30 mins - 5 hours |- ! Animation |
